attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament & get general election to restore democratic accountability.
attributes.additional_details: Trust in government has eroded. Urgent issues—from healthcare and housing to privacy and mental health—are met with silence or delay. We call for the dissolution of Parliament and a general election to restore democratic integrity and give the public a voice in shaping the future.
attributes.background: We believe the current government no longer reflects the will or wellbeing of the people. We call on the Prime Minister to request the dissolution of Parliament and initiate a general election, giving citizens the chance to choose new leadership.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
